about.bio:
Fullstack Application Developer specialized in Java & Javascript. Driven by
                    natural curiosity and relentless perseverance, I enjoy taking on a variety of technical challenges.
                    Moreover, my openness to learning new technologies allows me to innovate and continuously adapt to
                    the evolving demands of the development field.

projects.description: Design and creation of an employee management platform
Design & development of a sports application API

cfa.description: A project carried out during my apprenticeship year, aimed at creating an innovative platform to simplify user management and document creation for Dawan employees.

fa.description: Development of a mobile application in collaboration with another developer. In this project, I am responsible for designing and developing the backend, ensuring optimal performance and security.

jws.description: Design and implementation of a minimalist web server in Java, supporting GET requests, static files, and dynamic content, with multithreaded management for increased performance.

pdc.description: A full-stack application developed with Django Ninja and React, offering interactive and in-depth statistical analysis on drug consumption and personality.

portfolio.description: A modern and elegant portfolio dedicated to showcasing my skills, achievements, and projects, designed to capture the attention of recruiters and clients.
